DOC.brief_summary: This study design evaluate level CP-690,550 blood healthy Chinese subject follow single dos multiple dos drug .
DOC.brief_title: CP-690,550 Pharmacokinetics In Healthy Chinese Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy Chinese Volunteers No evidence active latent inadequately treated infection Mycobacterium tuberculosis ( TB ) Clinically significant infection within past 3 month Positive screen test hepatitis B surface antigen , antihepatitis C antibody , human immunodeficiency virus Pregnant nursing woman
